## Part One

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Solution

```{r}
#| label: 2015 - day 2 - part 1
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| collapse: true
library(tidyverse)

input <- readLines(con = "../../inputs/2015/02.txt")

paper <- tibble(original = input) |> 
    separate_wider_delim(cols = original, names = c("l", "w", "h"),
                         delim = "x", cols_remove = FALSE) |> 
    mutate(across(c(l, w, h), ~as.integer(.))) |> 
    rowwise() |>
    mutate(paper = sum(2L*l*w, 2L*w*h, 2L*h*l) + min(l*w, w*h, h*l)) |>
    ungroup()

paper |> 
    summarise(total_paper = sum(paper)) |> 
    pull(total_paper) |> 
    cat()
```

## Part Two

```{r}
#| label: 2015 - day 2 - part 2
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| collapse: true
paper <- paper |>
    rowwise() |>
    mutate(ribbon = 2 * (l+w+h-max(l,w,h)) + l*w*h) |>
    ungroup()

paper |> 
    summarise(total_ribbon = sum(ribbon)) |> 
    pull(total_ribbon) |> 
    cat()
```
